attributes.action: Force the SIA to publicly justify/reduce the extortionate license fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most front-line SIA licensees (officers/door supervisors etc) cannot see the reasoning behind the high fees charged for SIA licensing.  It is costing the majority of us over a week's wages to just be allowed to work for 3 years (plus training costs). SIA please justify the cost or show us the increased income (that should be enforced) and other support and benefits we were supposedly promised.
